original_text: Yes, you think that Egypt is strong enough to help you. But you should not trust Pharaoh, the king of Egypt. He is like a weak stick. If you use it to walk with, it will break! A broken piece of stick will make a hole through your hand and give you much pain! That is the trouble that the king of Egypt brings to everyone who trusts him to help them.
korean_text: 보라 네가 애굽을 믿는도다 그것은 상한 갈대 지팡이와 같은 것이라 사람이 그것을 의지하면 손이 찔리리니 애굽 왕 바로는 그를 믿는 모든 자에게 이와 같으니라

sentences.original_text: Yes, you think that Egypt is strong enough
sentences.korean_translation: 네, 당신은 이집트가 충분히 강하다고 생각합니다

sentences.original_text: But you should not trust Pharaoh
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 당신은 파라오를 믿어서는 안 됩니다

sentences.original_text: He is like a weak stick
If you use it to walk with
will make a hole through your hand

sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 당신에게 큰 고통을 줄 것입니다

sentences.original_text: that the king of Egypt brings
to everyone who trusts him to help them
sentences.korean_translation: 도움을 받기 위해 그를 믿는 모든 사람에게
